meanings.definition: A dish consisting of thinly sliced meat rolled around a filling, typically cooked in tomato sauce.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious braciolas for Sunday dinner.
meanings.sent2: The Italian restaurant served braciolas with a side of pasta.
meanings.sent3: The braciolas were so tasty that they danced in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of simmering braciolas filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: I could smell the savory braciolas from across the room.
